span.p: Los Al has a long-standing legacy of excellence in Academics, Athletics, Activities, and the Arts. All District schools have been honored as California Distinguished Schools and Gold Ribbon Schools. With a District API of 922, highly-talented teachers and staff ensure that students are prepared for unlimited possibilities now and following high school graduation. We are honored to serve the entire District Community - a great place to live, work, and go to school!
